text: ERIN SKIDDS Cell Phone: +1-904-994-3588 		 Email: erin.skidds@gmail.com 		 Portfolio: www.erinskidds.com Experienced Full-Stack Developer adept in front-end web development, Python, and AWS tools, with a proven track record of designing scalable systems and collaborating effectively across teams.
